sentences.en: Alexander is a member of the medical fraternity.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大在医务界工作.

sentences.en: And some talk about their fraternity days.
sentences.cn: 还有一些人谈论他们那些充满兄弟情谊的日子.

sentences.en: As manager of the Fraternity Club, I couldn't let that slide.
sentences.cn: 作为兄弟会的经理, 我不能让此发生.

sentences.en: At the same time , he treated his visitors as members of the fraternity of working politicians.
sentences.cn: 他把他的来访者看作都是从事政治工作的同行.

sentences.en: Bob needs the fraternity of others who share his mission.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃需要与他共同肩负这项使命的其他人的友爱互助。

sentences.en: Can you believe that nerd wants to join our fraternity?
sentences.cn: 你敢相信那个怪人想加入我们的兄弟会 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dean Vernon Wormer: Greg, what is the worst fraternity on this campus?
sentences.cn: 沃尔默: 格雷格, 校内最坏的兄弟会是哪个?

sentences.en: Emil's fraternity rather prided itself upon its dances.
sentences.cn: 爱弥儿的友爱在舞会上充分地显示了出来.

sentences.en: Great perils have beauty, they bring to light the fraternity of strangers.
sentences.cn: 重大的危难包涵着美, 它能让陌生者之间显现友爱之情.

sentences.en: He's a member of the medical fraternity.
His troubles include various encounters with the Fraternity of Crocodiles.
sentences.cn: 他的麻烦包括和鳄鱼兄弟会之间的各种冲突.

sentences.en: It occurred to Byron that he could go back to the fraternity house through Claremont Avenue.
sentences.cn: 拜伦突然想起,他蛮可以取道克莱蒙特大街返回兄弟会.

sentences.en: Marx's " view of fraternity " and Cao xueqin's " theory of human nature "
sentences.cn: 马克思的 “ 博爱观 ” 与曹雪芹的 “ 人性论 ”

sentences.en: There is a strong spirit of fraternity among these isolated people.
sentences.cn: 这些与世隔绝的人之间有强烈的兄弟般的情谊.

sentences.en: You're glad to be a member of this new water fraternity.
sentences.cn: 你也会为自己能成为这个新兴的水上运动俱乐部的一名成员而感到高兴的.

words.tran_cn: 杀害兄弟者；杀兄弟的行为
友爱；兄弟会；互助会；大学生联谊会

trans.tran_cn: 兄弟会，大学生联谊会，友爱
trans.tran_en: a club at an American college or university that has only male members
